A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Poorly written\, badly acted\, poor direction\, overuse of CGI\, and a betrayal of the star wars universe. There are plenty of reviews on this site and all over the internet that can explain what is wrong in more detail so I won't go to far into why I feel such hatred towards this movie\, but after seeing so many people rave about it and critics giving it high scores\, I had to give my two cents. I also have so many grievances that if I were to air them all here it would be longer than the script for this movie\, which was too long\, btw.
